title: About us - Cristal Therapeutics
description: Cristal Therapeutics offers CliCr: a powerful copper-free click chemistry reagent that meets all demands of the life science industry.
cleaned_text: Cristal Therapeutics focuses on its unique and proprietary copper free click chemistry CliCr®. CliCr® has a higher stability, enables faster reactions, and generates optimal bioconjugate products. Our mission is to offer our CliCr® technology to partners under license agreements in different diagnostic and therapeutic areas.
